pr_title: Allow Long as ID type in Entity for Cosmos DB

timeline.message: Allow Long as ID type in Entity for Cosmos DB

timeline.bodyText: I think we need this change for ReactiveCosmosTemplate as well.
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: Should be, but there's o similar method in ReactiveCosmosTemplate,  I unified the procesing of ID type conversion.
replies.author: moarychan

timeline.bodyText: Please make sure this also works for ReactiveCosmosRepository
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.bodyText: Can we add a unit test for this in CosmosEntityInformationUnitTest.java class ?
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.message:
Unified processing of ID type conversion and added test cases
https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/issues/12712

timeline.bodyText: This should return  type, why is it returning Object ?
timeline.author: kushagraThapar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -45,4 +47,26 @@
         //  Process response diagnostics
         responseDiagnosticsProcessor.processResponseDiagnostics(responseDiagnostics);
     }
+
+    /**
+     * ID value should be string value, real id type will be String, Integer, Long,
+     * all of these must be converted to String type.
+     * @param idValue id value to find
+     * @throws IllegalArgumentException thrown if id value fail the validation.
+     * @throws IllegalQueryException thrown if id value fail the validation.
+     * @return String id value
+     */
+    public static Object getStringIDValue(Object idValue) {

replies.bodyText: @moarychan - I have pushed a commit to fix this.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.message: Updated getStringIDValue API to return String instead of Object
